level.heading: Criteria for Council review and approval of certain contracts.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 1012(a) of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 10-1001.
